name: Physiotherapy
description: Physiotherapists are movement specialists whose training involves University degree level study medical science subjects such as anatomy, physiology, biomechanics and psychology. Physiotherapists also study a wide variety of treatment techniques, and continue to do so throughout their career. name: Manual Therapy
description: Manual therapy is helpful for the treatment of joints and muscles that lack adequate mobility and range of motion. This limitation can cause discomfort, pain, and an alteration in function, posture, and mobility.We have a wealth of experience in making recommendations for sport return and training considerations. Careful consideration is taken with the development, health, and return-to-sport concerns of the female athlete.

name: Acupuncture
description: Acupuncture is a process which stimulates points on the body using fine needles, finger or hand pressure to affect physical & mental health.It is also useful for clearing up pain issues and for managing stress relief and chronic and acute conditions. Our skilled physiotherapists and myotherapists can identify where the knots in the muscles are and use dry needling to compliment other manual treatment to speed up your recovery.if your physiotherapist believes it will help to improve the effectiveness of your overall treatment.
